content:
You can post feature request in the following forum: https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird%20android

There are the same feature requests in the above forum already, and you can upvote them:

https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/thunderbird-android-tree-folder-structure/idi-p/76330

https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/imap-folder-display-on-thunderbird-android/idi-p/83065
